game.name: NeuraGun
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: NeuraGun is a third-person science fiction puzzle game. The player will have to go through a maze of mysteries that will lead him out of the tangled scientific complex.
game.shortDescriptionEn: NeuraGun is a third-person science fiction puzzle game. The player will have to go through a maze of mysteries that will lead him out of the tangled scientific complex.

reviewHighlights.text: 이게 뭐여? 그래도 약간 집중하면 재미있음 난 초반에 막힘
